abstract: The founder of allofmp3.com, the Russian digital music download site that was shut down in July, was cleared of criminal wrongdoing in Moscow.
snippet: The founder of allofmp3.com, the Russian digital music download site that was shut down in July, was cleared of criminal wrongdoing in Moscow.
lead_paragraph: In Russia, Denis V. Kvasov is a just a hard-working, tax-paying entrepreneur. To the Western music industry, Mr. Kvasov is responsible for spreading Internet music piracy on a global scale.

headline.main: In the Clear in Russia (if Out of Business)
headline.print_headline: In the Clear in Russia (If Out of Business)
